title: How to find out the ranking/bracket a summoner is in?
body:
I was just in a normal game when one of my teammates said the enemy jungler was ranked bronze 4 and to watch out. (Most people on my team were low leveled.)

How do they know? Because I can only see the borders for my own team in the loading screen.

replies.body: Thanks! Is it a common practice to search everyone on the enemy team?

> [{quoted}](name=Starie,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=mQLs985Q,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-03-09T10:58:30.991+0000)
>
> Thanks! Is it a common practice to search everyone on the enemy team?

somewhat. I use lolnexus because I like to make sure I have the right runes and masteries though.
Wow, it really does give all the runes and masteries too @_@ I used to have to click on the champs in game and guess based on their stats.

Not only the runes and masteries of your opponents, but also how many ranked games they have played, ratio (wins/lose) and knowing their kda of the champion that they are playing. If you also click on the player it will take you to op.gg of the player.

I think it takes away the enjoyment of true competition.
it doesn't feel right to me as a player to use it but I guess its a personal taste thing
